title: Simulate Blast Radius in Digital Twin
description: In a training exercise, an emergency planner wants to simulate the impact of an explosion at a chemical plant to plan for evacuations.

tasks.description: Select the chemical plant's location in the digital twin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the point of origin for the simulation.

tasks.description: Run a blast radius and plume model simulation based on the type and amount of chemicals stored at the plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a map showing the potential impact zones for the explosion and subsequent chemical cloud.

tasks.description: Identify all residential buildings, schools, and hospitals within the simulated impact zones.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of critical facilities that would need to be evacuated.
